title: Review Frontend Code Changes
description: Conduct a comprehensive review of recent frontend code modifications, focusing on React components, state management, and performance optimizations.

title: Update API Documentation
description: Revise and update the existing API documentation to reflect the latest endpoint changes, including new parameters and response structures.

title: Adding new Task
description: Implement a robust task creation workflow with comprehensive form validation and error handling.

title: Optimize Database Queries
description: Analyze and refactor existing database queries to improve performance, focusing on reducing query execution time and optimizing index usage.

title: Implement User Authentication
description: Design and develop a secure user authentication system using OAuth 2.0, including multi-factor authentication and password reset functionality.

title: Create Design System
description: Develop a comprehensive design system with reusable components, color palette, typography guidelines, and consistent styling across the application.

title: Set Up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Configure a continuous integration and continuous deployment pipeline using GitHub Actions, including automated testing, build, and deployment processes.

title: Performance Audit
description: Conduct a comprehensive performance audit of the application, identifying bottlenecks, implementing code splitting, and optimizing asset loading.

title: Implement Error Monitoring
description: Set up advanced error monitoring and logging system using tools like Sentry, creating detailed error tracking and alerting mechanisms.

title: Refactor State Management
description: Restructure the application's state management approach, migrating to a more scalable and maintainable solution with improved context and reducer patterns.

title: Develop Mobile Responsiveness
description: Enhance the application's responsive design, ensuring seamless user experience across various device sizes and screen resolutions.
